鉹字的基本解释

鉹
chǐ
甑。
小刀。

鉹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǐ］
［《廣韻》尺氏切，上紙，昌。］
［《廣韻》弋支切，平支，以。］
甑。

鉹字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鉹； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1303第18
【唐韻】尺氏切【集韻】【韻會】敞尒切【正韻】尺里切，?侈上聲。【說文】曲鉹也。一曰鬵鼎。【爾雅·釋器】鬵，鉹也。【註】凉州呼鉹爲鬵。　又【廣韻】甑也。　又【集韻】一曰小刀。　又【集韻】【韻會】余支切【正韻】延知切，?音移。又【集韻】賞是切，音始。義?同。　【集韻】或作?。

鉹字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鉹字的起名意思

暂无。

caldron.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chǐ]
["Guangyun" Chishi cut, put on paper, Chang. ]
["Guangyun" Yi branch cut, flat branch, to. ]
caldron.
Pheasant
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Su Ji 1】【Golden Word Department】　鉹; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1303 Page 18
[Tang Yun] Chi's cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Open 尒切 [Zheng Yun] Chili cut, extravagant sound. [Said the text] Qu Xie also. One said the tripod. 【Erya·Release Device】鬵，鉹也. [Note] Liangzhou Huzhu is a 鬵.　[Guang Yun] Zeng Ye.　[Jiyun] One said a knife.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yuzhiqie [Zhengyun] Extend the knowledge and cut, and the sound shifts. [Jiyun] Appreciation is cut, the beginning of the sound. Righteous? Same.　【Jiyun】or make?.
